step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance. Ensure your shoulder is relaxed.
Excellent! Open your palm and fingers wide, really stretching them out.
Great job making a fist while inhaling. Squeeze those muscles firmly.
Perfect! Exhale and relax your hand, visualizing the fluid movement.
Second rep, looking good! Maintain that straight arm overhead and relaxed shoulder.
Nicely done opening your hand wide again. Keep those fingers spread!
You're making a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the good muscle tightening.
Fantastic finish! Exhale and relax, completing the pumping action. You're visualizing the fluid flow well.

exercise_summary: Great job with the overhead pumping exercise! You consistently kept your arm straight and opened your hand wide. Remember to inhale and make a tight fist, then exhale and relax. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out of your arm.
